text: Trying to find the page in the docs that was the list of all standard objects and their object type ID — searching for “object type id” is only showing API endpoints. Google results all pointing to non developers.HubSpot sites. I’m left to just keep clicking around the side bar looking…have no idea if this is under “Guides” or “Reference” or what.

I finally clicked the right page: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/crm/understanding-the-crm>

Literally I spent 10 minutes trying to find a page that I knew exists :disappointed:
